scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: In a letter, 1845 June 7, Cooper, Ostego Hall, Cooperstown, James Fenimore Cooper writes to the Rev. Mr. Eigenbrogt asking him to preside over services at Christ Church until a replacement can be found for the departed rector. In a letter, 1847 December 27, Cooper, Ostego Hall, writes to "Dear Sir" regarding the mild winter in the area.
